parameters.name: image_path
parameters.description: Local or S3 path where the SmartSPIM dataset is located
parameters.help_text: You can point to the data folder or the s3 path. It needs to point to the OMEZarr path. E.g., s3://aind-open-data/SmartSPIM_756457_2024-11-21_19-21-52_stitched_2024-11-23_03-00-56/image_tile_fusing/OMEZarr/Ex_639_Em_667.zarr

parameters.name: model_path
parameters.description: Path to the model that will be used
parameters.help_text: Path to the segmentation model that will be used

parameters.name: prob_threshold
parameters.description: Threshold that will be used to cut the probabilities and generate the mask.

parameters.name: output_folder
parameters.help_text: Path pointing to the output folder
